snippet: The two-year unbeaten streak of the American women’s soccer team ended at 43 games Friday with a 1-0 loss to Sweden at the Algarve Cup in Albufiera, Portugal.
abstract: Sweden defeats United States women's soccer team, 1-0, at Algarve Cup, ending two-year unbeaten streak and 43 consecutive victories; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: The two-year unbeaten streak of the American women’s soccer team ended at 43 games Friday with a 1-0 loss to Sweden at the Algarve Cup in Albufiera, Portugal.

headline.main: U.S. Women Lose for First Time in 2 Years

keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
